translations.translation: They did not expect to have a reckoning
They were those who did not expect a reckoning,
For indeed they did not look forward to any reckoning,
They did not expect such a Judgment
Indeed they had no fear of the account.
For verily, they used not to look for a reckoning.
Surely they feared not the account,
They indeed hoped not for a reckoning,
For lo! they looked not for a reckoning;
for they never expected to be called to account,
Verily they were wont not to look for a reckoning.
Indeed they did not expect any reckoning,
For that they used not to fear any account (for their deeds),
For verily, they used not to look for a reckoning.
Indeed, they did not hope for a Reckoning,
For they were not anticipating any reckoning.
Indeed, they were not expecting an account
[78:27] Indeed they never feared any reckoning, given their rejection of the Resurrection,
(For lo! they looked not) while in the life of the world (for a reckoning) they did not fear the chastisement of the Hereafter nor did they believe in it;

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { إِنَّهُمْ كَانُواْ لاَ يَرْجُونَ حِسَاباً } معناه لا يَخافونَ
 ويقال: لا يُبالونَ

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: وبالجملة: { إِنَّهُمْ كَانُواْ } حين يمموا على المعاصي، وعزموا على الآثام { لاَ يَرْجُونَ } ولا يأملون { حِسَاباً } [النبأ: 27] ولا يخافون عذاباً
